entry.title: Revelation NOW! Everything is about to change.

media:group.media:title: Revelation NOW! Everything is about to change.
media:group.media:description: Revelation NOW! Everything is about to change. Beginning in October, The Amazing Facts team will present a powerful new, life-changing three-week Bible prophecy series called Revelation Now! Broadcasting live from the Granite Bay Hilltop Church October 23 to November 14, the outreach event will air five nights a week. A perfect opportunity to introduce your friends and family to the truth during these unprecedented times!
